section_title: Use of resources for the year ending with 31 March 2011
section_text: 1 The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31 March 2011 is authorised to the amount of £5,776,805,000.

section_title: Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31 March 2011
section_text: 2 The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom and apply to the service of the year ending with 31 March 2011 the sum of £5,707,827,000.

3 1 The use of resources for the year ending with 31 March 2012 is authorised up to the amount of £245,218,342,000. 2 Of the amount authorised by subsection (1)— a £222,632,387,000 is authorised for use for current purposes; and b £22,585,955,000 is authorised for use for capital purposes. 3 The Treasury may— a issue money out of the Consolidated Fund, and b apply it in the year ending with 31 March 2012 for expenditure authorised by Parliament, up to the amount of £203,352,310,000.
4 This Act may be cited as the Consolidated Fund Act 2010.
